description:
Tsuna finally arrives at his destination—Shoichi Irie`s laboratory. As Tsuna stares at the round white device, Shoichi Irie himself appears before him. Irie shows him the Guardians he captured and the Vongola Rings he has gathered. Gokudera yells out to Tsuna, telling him not to worry about him and the other Guardians and to destroy the device. But Irie opens up the mysterious round white device. Tsuna and his friends are shocked at what was hidden. The time finally comes for Irie to tell the truth…
Source: crunchyroll
